disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
content: Participants are responsible for managing their own alcohol consumption and drinking responsibly.
Our establishment provides advice and service for moderate drinking only. Customers are fully responsible for their own drinking behavior.
The bar is not liable for any discomfort or other consequences resulting from excessive drinking.
MOJO Bar reserves the right to determine if a customer’s alcohol service needs to be discontinued to ensure the safety of the customer and others.
Customers are encouraged to drink responsibly and avoid driving after drinking.
We offer taxi-calling services to ensure your safety.
MOJO Bar promotes responsible and enjoyable drinking experiences. Please follow drinking regulations.
Ensure your own and others' safety and health.

event_rules.title: Event Rules
rules: Only those with a 19:30 reservation can participate.
Minors are prohibited from drinking. The bar will verify IDs, and minors can only enjoy non-alcoholic beverages.
After selecting your first drink from the event menu, you may get unlimited refills from the event menu items until the ice fully melts.
No refills are allowed after the ice has completely melted, as determined by the bartender in charge that day.
The challenge must be completed individually, and sharing drinks with others is prohibited. Violators will be charged at full price.
To protect the integrity of the challenge, participants refilling drinks will be given priority service, but please be patient as preparation time is still required.
Each person is limited to participating once per day. If it's not enough, come back for more another day!
MOJO Bar reserves the right for final interpretation of all rules.
